description: Prior approval for siting and appearance: Proposed erection of 15m telecommunications pole and additional equipment cabinets.
decision_conditions: <p><span style="line-height:1.2"><span style="vertical-align:top"><span style="overflow:hidden"><span style="overflow-wrap:break-word"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal;"><span style="font-variant-east-asian: normal;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline;"><font face="Arial"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed telecommunications pole, by reason of size, scale, siting and the introduction of significant additional street furniture, would comprise an overbearing and </span><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;">incongruous</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"> feature which detracts from the character and appearance of the surrounding area and the setting of the nearby Grade II* listed church, contrary to Hackney's LP33 (2020) Policies PP1 (Public Realm), LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets)</span></font></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="line-height:1.2"><span style="vertical-align:top"><span style="overflow:hidden"><span style="overflow-wrap:break-word"><span style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style="font-family:Arial"><span style="font-variant-numeric:normal"><span style="font-variant-east-asian:normal"><span style="vertical-align:baseline"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap"> and London Plan (2021) policies D3 (Optimising Site Capacity through a Design Led Approach), D4 (Delivering Good Design) and HC1 Heritage Growth and Conservation)</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><br></p>
